data.title: About: WVPM
data.meta_description: WVPM is a public radio formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Morgantown, West Virginia, serving North-Central West Virginia and Southwestern Pennsylvania. WVPM is owned and operated by West Virginia Educational Broadcasting Authority. WVPM is licensed to broadcast in the (digital) HD format.(Main article: West Virginia Public Broadcasting)
data.text:
dbo:abstract

WVPM is a public radio formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Morgantown, West Virginia, serving North-Central West Virginia and Southwestern Pennsylvania. WVPM is owned and operated by West Virginia Educational Broadcasting Authority. WVPM is licensed to broadcast in the (digital) HD format.(Main article: West Virginia Public Broadcasting) (en)

rdfs:comment

WVPM is a public radio formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Morgantown, West Virginia, serving North-Central West Virginia and Southwestern Pennsylvania. WVPM is owned and operated by West Virginia Educational Broadcasting Authority. WVPM is licensed to broadcast in the (digital) HD format.(Main article: West Virginia Public Broadcasting) (en)
